events.message: I recently received the laptop I ordered, but the screen has several scratches and the keyboard keys are sticky, which is really disappointing.
The reported issue involves scratches on the screen and sticky keyboard keys, classifying this case under product defect.
Your case has been assigned to a support specialist who will assist you with the defective product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to help resolve this for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the keyboard so we can evaluate the damage more clearly?
I have attached clear photos showing the scratched screen and the sticky keyboard keys as you requested.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer to receive a replacement laptop instead of a refund. Please proceed with the exchange.
Your replacement laptop order has been processed, and it will be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive tracking details shortly.
We hope your replacement laptop arrived in perfect condition. Please contact us if you have any further issues or questions.
